Subsection.title: Description
Subsection.Paragraph: documentation - Add documentation to an element

Subsection.title: Overview
Subsection.Paragraph: The documentation specifies a paragraph of documentation for an element.

Subsection.title: Semantics
Subsection.Paragraph: A documentation statement (documentation T s) adds the documentation string s to the object T.

Subsection.title: Example
Subsection.Paragraph: The following statement adds documentation to a Color record type:

FormalItem.title: Package Example
FormalItem.Verbatim:
(package com.io7m.cedarbridge)
(record Color (field red Float64) (field green Float64) (field blue Float64))
(documentation Color "The type of linear RGB color vectors.")
